data.caption: No guts, No Glory
data.description: m Ipsum has been the industrys standard dummy text ever since the 1500s, when an unknown printer took a galley of type and scrambled it to make a type

data.caption: 🍎 Diet I Follow in a Day 🥗
data.description:
🌞 Morning: Oats with fruits & black coffee ☕
🍲 Lunch: Brown rice, grilled chicken & veggies 🥦
🍎 Evening Snack: Nuts & green tea 🍵
🍛 Dinner: Paneer curry with chapati 🫓
🥛 Before Bed: Warm milk with turmeric 🌙
